aka: A Lullaby Under the Nuclear Sky
awards:
第19届釜山国际电影节(2014)
　　最佳纪录片奖(提名)
this_title: あの日から 変わってしまった空の下で 君を抱きしめる
trans_title: A Lullaby Under the Nuclear Sky
introduction: A documentary filmmaker enters the evacuation zone in the aftermath of the Fukushima nuclear power plant meltdown incident. Discovering that she is pregnant, the filmmaker begins filming herself to create a self-portrait of becoming a first time mother in the age of nuclear nightmare.
chinese_title: あの日から 変わってしまった空の下で 君を抱きしめる
